title: UPPSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 7466 Assistant Teacher Post
description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 7466 Assistant Teacher Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, B.Ed, MCA, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025 . Hee we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online t...
